entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Occasional drifting snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
